items.title: Pick up Anker’s latest 20,100mAh 3-port power bank with a max 220W output for $150 right now
items.summary:
From its official Amazon storefront, folks can currently score Prime-exclusive pricing on Anker’s Prime 20,100mAh 3-Port 220W Power Bank for $149.99 shipped, which matches its direct website pricing right now, saving you $80 over the 26k mAh model direct from Anker, as well as at its Amazon listing (though you do get 6k mAh more capacity). This is the latest of Anker’s power bank solutions for your personal devices that released back towards the end of November with a $180 MSRP, and has seen discounts having gone as low as $120 during Black Friday. Today’s deal strikes $30 off the going rate and landing it $30 above the lowest price we have tracked. You can learn more about it below or within our hands-on review from 9to5Mac.

more…

LEGO Ideas Disney Pixar Luxo Jr. set

Buy for $59 (Reg. $70)

What we love

If you’re a Pixar fan, this brick-built Luxo Jr. set will be more than familiar to you, and it’s ready to join your Disney/Pixar collections so you can have the iconic mascot front and center – complete with a printed Luxo ball that can be squished like in opening movie credits! items.title: Save up to 42% on three BougeRV bike carriers that hold up to 200 pounds – all at lows starting from $160
items.summary:
By way of its official Amazon storefront, BougeRV is offering the lowest prices we have tracked on three of its tilting and foldable bike hitch carriers, with the most recent model that can handle the most weight being the Lockable Hitch Mount Platform 2.0 Bike Carrier at $259.99 shipped. Coming down from its full $450 price tag, this rate first appeared in November and has since been repeating a few times through December’s holiday season, with the price otherwise having kept at $300 or $400 with discounts. You’re not only getting another chance at the best price we have tracked, but also the first 2026 opportunity here, saving you $190 on a bike carrier for your vehicle that can carry up to 200 pounds (so e-bike transport is best supported here). There’s also the brand’s first-generation platform style carrier that can hold up to 150 pounds at its low of $169.99 shipped, while the second-generation hanging style carrier that holds up to 165 pounds and up to four bikes is also at its low of $159.99 shipped.
